Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a two-run home run in the second inning.
Teoscar Hern√°ndez hit a grand slam in the third inning for the Dodgers.
Mookie Betts hit a home run to break his 0-for-22 playoff slump.
Robert Suarez struck out Gavin Lux on a full-count pitch to complete a four-out save.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres moved within one victory of eliminating the Dodgers in the NLDS for the second time in three seasons.
The game was played in front of a record crowd of 47,744 at Petco Park.
Manny Machado ended up on third after being hit on the left shoulder by a throw from Freddie Freeman.
Walker Buehler allowed six runs and seven hits in five innings.
